## OnChainResolver.getRevocationOnChain() method

Gets partial revocation status info from onchain issuer contract.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getRevocationOnChain(credentialStatus: CredentialStatus, issuer: DID): Promise<RevocationStatus>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  credentialStatus | [CredentialStatus](./js-sdk.credentialstatus.md) | credential status section of credential |
|  issuer | DID |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[RevocationStatus](./js-sdk.revocationstatus.md)&gt;

`{Promise<RevocationStatus>}`
